marklogic.body: Now this is how sikh religious body SGPC works. You have goons and immoral people at the top of this body. Whenever there is a mixing of politics and religion that is bound to happen. SGPC is a body which interferes in politics of Punjab and that is where moral down gradation of Punjab started. SGPC is a Taliban or Jamaat-ud-dawaaÂ in sophisticated form. Sikhism is following the path of radical Islam. Sikhs are emotional people and this religious body is playing with their sentiments and emotions and brain washing some of young sikh's mind. Faith in religion is one thing but whenever a religion start having sentiments that their religion is superior to others, their downfall starts. SGPC supported extremist elements in sikh community which leads to Bleeding of Punjab in 80s to early 90s. Now, they are instructing Akali dal (who are directly linked to SGPC) to support Rajona. This guy (Rajoana) is a killer who killed not only elected CM of Punjab but also 16 other innocent people. What about their families? I have a question to all who is supporting Rajona what if one of your family members (your father, mother, brother, sister, wife or kid) would have died in that blast. Would you still ask for clemency? This is not a religious issue but issue of justice and closure. Now, some people will start question me about 1984 sikh riots. Yes, that riot was also for a short term political and those who were involved should be hanged for killing innocent people. There is no two answers about it. These things will keep happening in India till these old politicians who will keep thinking of short political Gains, and till voters won't be mature enough to vote on development and security instead of religious and castist emotions. This is a high time that Sikh should delink themselves from these extremist views for the education and progress of sikh community as a whole.
